meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study of mollusks.
meanings.sent1: The malacological research team discovered a new species of snail.
meanings.sent2: Her malacological expertise helped identify the rare seashell.
meanings.sent3: The malacological conference was filled with shell enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: His malacological knowledge was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The malacological field trip was both educational and fun.

meanings.sent1: The malacological presented her findings at the marine biology conference.
meanings.sent2: As a malacological, he spent hours examining clam shells.
meanings.sent3: The malacological's office was filled with shells of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent4: She was a malacological dedicated to preserving marine life.
meanings.sent5: The malacological's passion for mollusks was contagious.
